item.title: U.K.’s CMA Gives Itself Greater Powers Over Apple And Google
item.description: The U.K.'s competition watchdog has flexed its muscles in the mobile app market, slapping "strategic market status" on Apple and Google.

item.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Hack Confirmed — What You Need To Know
item.description: The Samsung Galaxy S25 has been hacked — here’s what we know.

item.title: Valve Just Crashed The High End ‘Counter-Strike’ Skins Market
item.description: Some Counter-Strike 2 skins are now worth hundreds of dollars less than they were just 24 hours ago after Valve makes a controversial change.
